sentences.en: After cooking the fish, pour off any excess fat.
sentences.cn: 烹完鱼后，倒掉多余的油。

sentences.en: Any day now, the Northern forces may pour across the new border.
sentences.cn: 北方的军队现在随时都可能大批越过新边界。

sentences.en: Blood was pouring from his nose.
sentences.cn: 血从他的鼻子里涌出来。

sentences.en: He got up and poured himself another drink.
sentences.cn: 他站起身来，给自己又倒了一杯。

sentences.en: He was so worried that sweat began to pour down his face.
sentences.cn: 他很着急,汗水沿着他的面颊直淌下来.

sentences.en: Heat this syrup and pour it over.
Pour a cup of the gelatinous mixture into the blender.
sentences.cn: 往搅拌器里倒入一杯胶质混合物。

sentences.en: Pour a kettle of boiling water over the onions.
Pour a little of the sauce over the chicken.
sentences.cn: 在鸡肉上浇一点调味汁。

sentences.en: Pour it on, boys, and we'll soon have the job done!
sentences.cn: 小伙子们加油, 这活儿一会儿就干完了!

sentences.en: Pour the broth through a strainer.
sentences.cn: 把肉汤倒进滤网滤一下。

sentences.en: Pour the mixture into the cake tin and bake for 45 minutes.
sentences.cn: 把混合物倒进烤模烤制45分钟。

sentences.en: Pour the sauce over the pasta.
She asked Tillie to pour her a cup of coffee.
sentences.cn: 她请蒂莉给她倒杯咖啡。

sentences.en: She hurried away to pour more coffee and tend to the grill.
sentences.cn: 她匆忙走开，去添加咖啡和照看烤架。
她为每个人都倒了咖啡。

sentences.en: Stir the sauce and pour it over the top.
sentences.cn: 搅拌调味汁，把它浇在上面。

sentences.en: The French crowds pour like lemmings down the motorway to Paris.
sentences.cn: 一群群法国人像旅鼠一样涌上通往巴黎的高速公路。

phrases.phrase: it never rains but it pours

phrases.tran_cn: 大量地涌入，倾倒；蜂拥而来
[化]倾点，流点；[化]流动点，浇注点；零

trans.tran_cn: 倾倒，倒（饮料等），倾泻，倾盆而下，蜂拥，源源而来
trans.tran_en: to make a liquid or other substance flow out of or into a container by holding it at an angle
to make a liquid or other substance flow out of or into a container by holding it at an angle
to make a liquid or other substance flow out of or into a container by holding it at an angle
